title: ESPN's Adam Schefter and Jeff Passan
description:
ESPN's Adam Schefter and Jeff Passan join The Woj Pod to discuss the futures of the NBA, NFL and MLB, how we're covering sports in a pandemic, the commonality of insider roles and Passan's latest ode to The WuTang Clan.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
